title: I just lost half my hp to a nid spear
body: And I can't dodge a invisible spear riot. So fucking disable her ( or delete ) , or hotfix this BS

replies.body: Buy a Pink ward. Bam, invisibility not a problem.
....? ur joking right? if ur not joking I'm gonna cry xD

> [{quoted}](name=Hudson Gaga,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=wE2VOm6c,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-03-22T02:43:25.113+0000)
>
> ....? ur joking right? if ur not joking I'm gonna cry xD

dodge the pink ward and cc her spears
-General Discussion

um yeah pink wards grant true sight which would reveal an invisible spear

DUH

"Pink ward her spears."

It's a long running joke.
Back in my day, it was 80%. And it was invisible the whole way.

> [{quoted}](name=Devi Freak Mint,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=wE2VOm6c,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-03-22T02:17:24.255+0000)
>
> Back in my day, it was 80%. And it was invisible the whole way.

Back in my day, there was no Nidalee. There was just spears of death that could one hit kill you while being invisible the entire time. And lets not forget that they each of them was the size of a house.
Back when Nid spear had a bigger hit box than Hec ult. :'(
Don't forget that the old Nuclear Spears also had almost twice as wide a hit box. Even when I dodged them I got hit...

But at least it didn't have a 50% chance of going through minions. The old broken invisible spear at least hit minion so hiding behind them was a viable option, now it's apparently champion only half the time.
Back in my day, She used her ATK speed boost and bonus defensive stats to rape everything with cougar form.
Did she also gapclose and take away the other half?
i lost half my health to a vayne auto attack and i can't dodge it.. so whats your point?

> [{quoted}](name=SwiftKitten88,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=wE2VOm6c,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-03-22T04:16:17.088+0000)
>
> i lost half my health to a vayne auto attack and i can't dodge it.. so whats your point?

Vayne aa - 550 range
Nidalee spear - huge as fuck range

> [{quoted}](name=SwiftKitten88,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=wE2VOm6c,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-03-22T04:16:17.088+0000)
>
> i lost half my health to a vayne auto attack and i can't dodge it.. so whats your point?

ive lost 1k+ hp to a single nid spear i have never in the history of LoL have lost close to that much from a single adc auto.
It's not an auto, it's an ability (if your talking about nidalee Q spear) because I don't think a normal aa woul do that much dmg.

> [{quoted}](name=SwiftKitten88,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=wE2VOm6c,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-03-22T04:16:17.088+0000)
>
> i lost **half my health** to a** vayne auto attack** and i can't dodge it.. so whats your point?

Did you AFK for the first 20 mins?
half hp? so what, ahri's q can take more and is way easier to land

Uh, Ahri's Q can do a maximum of 280 + 70% of her AP at max rank, which doesn't count magic resist ignoring the first part. 

Nid Q does between 150 + 40% (point blank) to 450 + 120%, once again, not counting MR. Most of the time Nid Q is gonna be outdamaging Ahri's Q, and that's before you get into the huge followup damage from Nid. 

I mean, if Ahri is taking away more than half your HP with an ability that does a 280 + 70% of her AP, then she is outrageously fed and you're outrageously behind.

> [{quoted}](name=ThePlasticSpork,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=wE2VOm6c,comment-id=00090000,timestamp=2015-03-22T13:41:13.356+0000)
>
> Uh, Ahri's Q can do a maximum of 280 + 70% of her AP at max rank, which doesn't count magic resist ignoring the first part. 
> 
> Nid Q does between 150 + 40% (point blank) to 450 + 120%, once again, not counting MR. Most of the time Nid Q is gonna be outdamaging Ahri's Q, and that's before you get into the huge followup damage from Nid. 
> 
> I mean, if Ahri is taking away more than half your HP with an ability that does a 280 + 70% of her AP, then she is outrageously fed and you're outrageously behind.

multiply by 2, it does true damage when returns too

Again, her damage doesn't ramp up that hard as compared to Nidalee. 

Also missing out on if Ahri really is two-shotting you she is outrageously fed.
That does include the true damage, her q does 140 + 35% magic/true damage
Oh, you mean that thing that is visible and therefore dodgeable?
OP is talking about bug where nidalee's spears don't have a model, only particles, but forum is ready and load to unleash the full power of QQ machine.
If a big play is made in LCS with invis spear, they'll fix it immediately.
lol they banned the skin with that bug for the lcs they know it's a problem they just won't fix it
Or can't. o.0

Sometimes it's completely invisible. I made a custom game to test with my husband. We are in the same room, on two computers, and we found reliable spots on her Vanilla skin where you can throw spears and make them completely invisible every time.  We also found they will go invisible around mid-creek area, because it appears it goes under the terrain and so it 'disappears' completely from view. The other spots were apparent glitches, as they have be thrown at just the right angle through walls.  Sometimes they would show up visible on his screen, while being invisible on mine.  Sometimes it was invisible on both.  It is just very glitchy atm.

Edit: We discovered the 'under the terrain' effect after we finally found a spot where the spear was visible, the went invisible under the terrain, then came out of the terrain visible again.
It's currently a bug (read: feature) where if Nidalee throws a spear from a bush, the projectile is invisible and all you can see are the particles.
you can see the particles if you are lucky, sometimes you dont even see that.

> [{quoted}](name=PrinceOfStorms,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=wE2VOm6c,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-03-22T02:47:10.574+0000)
>
> It's currently a bug (read: feature) where if Nidalee throws a spear from a bush, the projectile is invisible and all you can see are the particles.

So if i play nid always trow spears from bush and be awate of pink wards thx

No pink wards don't help. I'll copy my post above on my testing..

Sometimes it's completely invisible. I made a custom game to test with my husband. We are in the same room, on two computers, and we found reliable spots on her Vanilla skin where you can throw spears and make them completely invisible every time. also spear hitbox needs fixing, I get hit by it when it shouldn't

As bad as it is now, it used to be way worse.  It made LeBlanc's tether seem tiny by comparison.  

Note:  I am not defending its stupidly big hitbox, just reminding older players of those dark times.  The javelin's hitbox got nerfed, then buffed, but it's still smaller than it was about a year ago.
Makes leblanc's tether look small, you mean makes morgana's snare seem fair. That spear used to have a hit box the same size as that with a particle half as wide
they dont need to fix the hitbox per se, they can just enlarge the animation/projectile image to match the hitbox if they dont want it to be too tiny.
aka {{champion:25}}

> [{quoted}](name=DropFill,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=wE2VOm6c,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-03-22T02:12:07.237+0000)
>
> And I can't dodge a invisible spear riot. So fucking disable her ( or delete ) , or hotfix this BS

THANK YOU I thought it was only me who thought it was invisible since every time I made a discussion about it people would down vote it.
well stop posting here and get back to your game!

Before nidalee rework that spear would've one shot you. I think you could have up to a 2400 dmg spear before her rework it was kinda insane so like feel lucky its not a invisible pre rework nid spear.

Lol i was playing a 4v5 in normals on my main champion, {{champion:76}} , with my level 20 friend because I was tilting in ranked. I could take 3/4 of the enemy's {{champion:85}} and {{champion:26}} with one spear. Then after I stole baron we were able to win the game. It was absolutely insane!! #ALLHAILNID
Does it really matter? You'll die eventually anyways. Might as well have a little guessing game with the spears.
Nidalee is back to her Season 3 form, except now, she h as her cougar form at level 1 and can pounce on your ass as well.  Fucking ban her every game.

I was playing {{champion:104}} once upon a time.

I was farming some minions that were right outside turret range, I was at about 700 health.

Then, SPONTANEOUS COMBUSTION!

"An enemy is legendary! {{champion:76}}"

I thought it was an intended effect...if she throws them from outside the fog of war they are invis (or rather, only the particles are visible, not the spear itself).  I agree that it shouldn't be that way though.
From fog of war yeah I see how that can be frustrating. If you have vision of her you can see the direction she threw it on her animation. Easily dodge able
Yesterday there was an invisible Ashe ikr that I couldn't see so thanks riot, we won the game tho so it's ok

I always use purple wards to see nids spears

also you squeeshy mofo buy some {{item:1033}}

My Yi build does more damage with a single basic attack.
